messages.content: Our country has seen financial crisis, the worst recession in a generation and the appalling scandal of MPs' expenses.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Most people know that the Conservatives won't deliver real change. Cutting taxes for millionaires won't make Britain any fairer and vital public services like our NHS won't be safe in their hands.
A Britain where every child will get the best education and can afford to go to university if they wish.
A Britain where we have more green jobs and prosper while protecting our environment.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many areas, the race at the General Election is between the Liberal Democrats and Labour. Your vote could decide who wins!

issues.economy: Our country has seen financial crisis, the worst recession in a generation and the appalling scandal of MPs' expenses.
issues.education: A Britain where every child will get the best education and can afford to go to university if they wish.
issues.environment: A Britain where we have more green jobs and prosper while protecting our environment.
issues.governance: The appalling scandal of MPs' expenses.
issues.health: Vital public services like our NHS won't be safe in their hands.

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe that Britain is ready to take a once in a generation opportunity for real change.

images.caption: Nick Clegg - Change that works for you
